content: in next space single_crochet in the double_crochet only of ea 2-double_crochet group around skip the sps join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain and single_crochet around 36 single_crochet place thread marker to note beginning of rounds foot worked in continuous spiral rounds do not join with slip_stitch at end of ea round move thread marker up each round to note beginning of rounds rnds 1-12 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 36 single_crochet at end of round 12 finish last step of last single_crochet by attaching white cut gold toe worked in rounds with slip_stitch join at end of ea round round 1 with white chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next 17 single_crochet place thread marker to note side of toe single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet place thread marker to note other side of toe join with sl st 36 single_crochet round 2 decrease round chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet decrease single_crochet across to 3 single_crochet before first marker decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet sl marker single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease single_crochet across to 3 single_crochet before second marker decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet sl marker join with slip_stitch 32 single_crochet round 3 even round chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 32 single_crochet repeat rnds 2 & 3 until 16 single_crochet remain then decrease every round until 8 single_crochet remain cut yarn leaving 8 tail gather sts decrease and pull to close toe weave in tails heel attach white to center back of stocking at heel opening on the 2 double_crochet-group edge chain 1 work 36 single_crochet evenly around opening join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 36 single_crochet place thread marker to note each side of heel work heel same as rnds 2 & 3 of toe until 14 sts remain then decrease every round until 10 sts rem cut yarn gather sts to close opening weave in tails decorative top edging working on opposite side of beginning chain at top of stocking join white at center back round 1 chain 1 work 48 single_crochet evenly around top of stocking join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 48 single_crochet 3 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet chain 1 skip 2 single_crochet *in next single_crochet work double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet chain- 1 double_crochet shell completed chain 1 skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending with chain 1 join with slip_stitch 8 shells round 3 picot round chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet slip_stitch to first space of first shell *chain 3 slip_stitch in same space slip_stitch in next space repeat from * twice slip_stitch in next 2 sps yarn is in position in first space of next shell ** repeat from * to ** around join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet 8 shells with 3 picot points on ea shell fasten_off and weave in tails hanger attach gold at center back seam inside top of stocking chain 15
